ability.name: Blood Reaper
ability.description: When this model makes an initial attack with this weapon, it makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in its LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Blood Reaper attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Blood Rain
spells.description: Blood Rain causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Corrosion continuous effect.

spells.name: Lamentation

spells.name: Mortality
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2DEF and ARM, loses Tough, and cannot have damage removed from it. Mortality lasts for one round.

When an affected model targets a living model with a charge or slam power attack, it gains +2" movement. Terminal Velocity lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Knowledge Of The Damned [Control] [Soul]

characterabilities.name: Soul Scavenger [Ctrl]

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [5 Tokens]

feat.name: Black Gate

When an enemy model casts a spell while in Scaverous' control range, increase the COST by 1. Black Gate lasts for one round.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)

spells.name: Death Ward

You can then add one Grunt to a friendly Faction small-based undead unit in the spellcaster's Control Range. Place the Grunt in formation and completely within 3" of the spellcaster. The Grunt must forfeit its Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Cryx units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Cryx Solos as well.

Sacrificial Lamb can be cast only once per activation.

It cannot be targeted by free strikes.).

characterabilities.name: Coven
characterabilities.description: The Witch Coven of Garlghast is made up of Helleana, Morgaen, and Selene. The Coven shares a single focus pool, and Coven models do not receive focus individually. The Coven's base AAT and ARC is three times the number of models in the Coven that are in play. When the Coven replenishes it's focus, the Egregore receives those focus. The Coven's Control Range is measured from the Egregore. Any Coven model in the Coven's Control Range can spend focus on the Egregore. Effects that reduce or remove focus never affect the Egregore. The Coven can use its feat only once. The Coven counts as a single Warcaster when calculating Field Allowance. The Coven can have up to one attached model, which is attached to the Coven, not to an individual model in the Coven. The Coven can have only one of each of its upkeep spells in play at any time. The Coven shares a collective battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Perfect Conjunction
characterabilities.description: A Perfect Conjunction is established at any time the Egregore is completely within the triangular area between all three Witches. During a Perfect Conjunction, magic attack accuracy rolls made by one of the Witches are automatically boosted.

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many tokens it can carry.

characterabilities.name: Wraith Walker
characterabilities.description: At the end of your Control Phase, this model can become incorporeal for one round unless it was incorporeal during the last round.

feat.name: Web Of Shadow
feat.description: Choose 6 friendly non-leader Faction models currently in Deneghra's control range. The chosen models become Incorporeal for one round.

execution.name: Spectral Vortex
execution.description: This model can immediately negate any spell that targets it or a model within 3" of it by spending 1 soul token. The negated spell does not take effect, but its COST remains spent.

ability.name: Dark Banishment [5"]
ability.description: When this model hits an enemy model with this weapon during its activation, after the attack is resolved you can warp the enemy model anywhere completely within 5" of its currently location. A model can be warped by Dark Banishment only once per turn.

ability.name: Shadow Fire
ability.description: A model hit by this attack does not block LOS for one turn.

spells.name: Breath Stealer
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD and DEF for one round.

spells.name: Curse Of Shadows
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

spells.name: Damnation
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster’s battlegroup can charge or make slam power attacks against target model without spending focus. They can ignore forests and cloud effects when determining LOS when declaring a charge or slam attack against the affected model. They gain +2” movement and Pathfinder when resolving charges or slam power attacks targeting the affected model.

spells.name: Hellmouth
spells.description: If this attack misses, nothing happens. If it hits, before making the damage roll, push models within 3" of the model hit 3" directly toward it in the order you choose. Then center a 3" AOE on the model hit. Models hit suffer a POW 12 damage roll. Models boxed by Hellmouth are removed from play.

spells.name: Shadow Step
spells.description: Enemy models currently within 2” of the spellcaster suffer Shadow Bind for one round. Additionally, you can place the spellcaster anywhere completely within 3” of its current location. Shadow Step can be cast only once per activation. (A model suffering Shadow Bind suffers -3 DEF, and for one round when it advances it cannot move except to change facing. Shadow Bind can be shaken.)

spells.name: Venom
spells.description: Venom causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Continuous Corrosion effect.

characterabilities.name: Ambush Deployment
characterabilities.description: You can choose not to deploy this model/unit at the start of the game. If it is not deployed normally, place a burrow marker at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment, up to 12" beyond your deployment zone, and not within 6” of another burrow marker.

characterabilities.name: Bond [Terminus]
characterabilities.description: If this model begins the game in Terminus’ battlegroup, it is bonded to him. This model is not considered to be bonded while under your opponent’s control. While this model is bonded to Terminus and in his control range, it gains Unyielding. (A model with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Burrow (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Place a burrow marker in base contact with this model/leader of this unit. Then remove this model/unit from the table. Effects, spells, and animi on this model/unit expire when it uses Burrow.

characterabilities.name: Drag Below
characterabilities.description: During this model’s activation, when this model boxes an enemy warrior model with a melee attack, this model can use Drag Below to remove the boxed model from play. Immediately after resolving this attack, this model can make a full advance and then perform a Burrow.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Aggressive
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Surface [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the beginning of any of your Maintenance Phases after your first turn, you can place this model/unit completely within 5" of the burrow marker and remove the marker from the table. Additionally, it must forfeit its Normal Movement during its activation the turn it is placed into play.

ability.name: Hard Head

characterabilities.name: Salvage

characterabilities.name: Serpentine

The Replicator becomes the type of weapon adapted (melee or ranged) and uses that weapon’s RNG, ROF, AOE and POW. This effect lasts until Cankerworm uses Adapt again.

subabilities.description: When a living or undead enemy model is boxed by this attack, you can choose to take control of it. For the rest of the turn, this model’s battlegroup controller can channel spells through the affected model as if it were a model in its battlegroup with the Arc Node Advantage. The affected model cannot activate. At the end of the turn, the affected model is destroyed.

When a friendly Faction Leader removes a corpse token from this mode, the leader can gain either a Focus point, Fury point, or corpse token. Each leader can only do this once per turn.

characterabilities.description: This model begins the game with one corpse token. When a living or undead model is destroyed within 8” of this model, this model gains the destroyed model’s corpse token if it does not already have one. This model cannot have more than one corpse token at any time.

characterabilities.name: Revulsion
characterabilities.description: While this model has a corpse token, it gains Stealth.
